ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.io.util

Interface DataMover

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMover, EncryptedMover, GZIPMover

    public interface DataMover
    Interface for a DataMover as used by HostBridge. The main job of a DataMover is to move files from an InputStream over to an OutputStream. After this is done, both streams has to be closed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exportMove(java.io.InputStream virtualSource, java.io.OutputStream hostTarget)
      Indicates that an export is done.
      void importMove(java.io.InputStream hostSource, java.io.OutputStream virtualTarget)
      Indicates that an import is done.

    • Method Detail

      • importMove

        void importMove(java.io.InputStream hostSource,
              java.io.OutputStream virtualTarget)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Indicates that an import is done. After the data is moved, both streams must be closed by the DataMover implementation.
        Parameters:
        hostSource - the data source (is on the host system)
        virtualTarget - the data target (is on the virtual disk)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • exportMove

        void exportMove(java.io.InputStream virtualSource,
              java.io.OutputStream hostTarget)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Indicates that an export is done. After the data is moved, both streams must be closed by the DataMover implementation.
        Parameters:
        virtualSource - the data source (is on the virtual disk)
        hostTarget - the data target (is on the host system)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
